title: SRAM GX AXS wireless Eagle 12-speed drivetrains debut; same tech, lower price
content:
Under the tagline of “All Day AXS”, the new SRAM GX Eagle AXS rear derailleur and shifter bring wireless MTB drivetrains into reach for a lot more mountain bikers. Packing the exact same tech as both XX1 & X01, this new GX Eagle AXS derailleur is almost half the price, making the upgrade path from […]

The post SRAM GX AXS wireless Eagle 12-speed drivetrains debut; same tech, lower price appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
